name: HipChat - beta version
description: Great Teams Use HipChat - A group messaging app built and designed for team communication and collaboration.  With HipChat, you can send group messages, create searchable persistent team chat rooms, send 1:1 messages, share files and integrate with over 80+ products, and more.  THE GOOD STUFF: * Collaborate with coworkers, teammates and friends around new builds, projects, campaigns and ideas * Real-time messaging and file sharing makes it easy for your team to stay connected on the go * Be more productive.  * Faster than email. More personal than faxing. * HipChat is private, safe and secure * Create unlimited rooms and 1:1 conversations * Easily share and view files and images  * Complete chat history saves your conversations so you can always search for them * Never miss a beat with email and mobile push notifications when youre away * Integrates with your favorite Atlassian products  Jira, Jira ServiceDesk, Confluence, Bitbucket * Works with +80 integrations including Twitter, MailChimp, Wunderlist, UserVoice, Drive, Hangouts and more * Loved by great teams in startups and enterprises.  WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS ARE SAYING: We use HipChat, not just for our work, but to foster the spirit of great tech culture. -Gilt Groupe We use HipChat for Android. Flexibility is important to our team, particularly being able to work from home or choose the hours you work and helps keep our team connected -RunKeeper HipChat keeps everyone up-to-date and accountable! -Aeria Games HipChat is the first app we open to start the day. Its our company water cooler and work communication in one place. -Intridea  GET IT NOW: * Check out at Hipchat.com/downloads for other apps * Need an account?
